CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 19, 1961, pg. A15, reads: "BRIDAL SHOWER - Miss Lois Weatherspoon, who will be married next month, was feted at a bridal shower last Saturday at Cleve Temple on Carson St. Seated left to right: Mmes. Laura Anderson, Odessa Jordan, Mattie Jordan and Miss Lula Brundage.  Standing left to right: Miss Albert Wilson, Miss Helen Frye, Mrs. Julia Baker, Miss Weatherspoon, the honoree; Miss Georgie Moore, Miss Dorothy Thomas, Mrs. Ella Davis and Mrs. Eleanor Johnson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of women at bridal shower for Lois Weatherspoon, seated left to right: Laura Anderson, Odessa Jordan, Mattie Jordan and Lula Brundage; standing: Alberta Wilson, Helen Frye, Julia Baker, Lois Weatherspoon, Georgie Moore, Dorothy Thomas, Ella Davis, and Eleanor Johnson, posed behind table with cake, flower cart centerpiece, and trays of food, in Cleve Temple, Carson Street
